content.html: Graham Norton’s comments were *so* mild that I was initially critical, thinking he could have done more and he still got hounded off of twitter - for saying people should listen to trans people on trans issues. He attacked no one. He expressed no view. #IStandWithGrahamNorton
content.value: Graham Norton’s comments were *so* mild that I was initially critical, thinking he could have done more and he still got hounded off of twitter - for saying people should listen to trans people on trans issues. He attacked no one. He expressed no view.  #IStandWithGrahamNorton
